sentence.Network_en: It's very shortsighted not to spend money on repairing the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 不想花钱修理房子,这是缺乏远见的.

sentence.Network_en: Don't be so shortsighted as to see only what is under your nose.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要这样目光如豆,只看到鼻子尖下这一点点.

sentence.Network_en: His philosophical eyes were obviously shortsighted by the evil influence of Nazism.
sentence.Network_cn: 显然,他那双哲学家般的深邃的眼睛也被纳粹的妖氛所眩惑.

list.abs: This is a very shortsighted decision ., 这是一项非常缺乏远见的决定.

entry.def: If you are short-sighted, you cannot see things properly when they are far away, because there is something wrong with your eyes.

example.ex: Testing showed her to be very short-sighted.
example.tran: 检查表明她近视得很厉害。

entry.def: If someone is short-sighted about something, or if their ideas are short-sighted, they do not make proper or careful judgments about the future.

example.ex: Environmentalists fear that this is a short-sighted approach to the problem of global warming...
example.tran: 环境保护主义者担心这并非解决全球变暖问题的长久之计。

example.ex: I think we're being very short-sighted.
example.tran: 我认为我们这样做目光很短浅。

auth_sentence.content: But Friends of the Earth says the policy is shortsighted.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Friends of the Earth says the policy is shortsighted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Friends of the Earth says the policy is shortsighted.

auth_sentence.content: This is, to me, an incredibly shortsighted politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is, to me, an incredibly shortsighted politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is, to me, an incredibly shortsighted politics.

auth_sentence.content: But dismissing the book on those grounds alone would be shortsighted.
auth_sentence.res_content: But dismissing the book on those grounds alone would be shortsighted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But dismissing the book on those grounds alone would be shortsighted.

sentences.en: It’s very shortsighted not to spend money on repairing the house.
sentences.cn: 不想花钱修理房子, 这是缺乏远见的。
